name: Triviaquiztime
0:
”Alexa, start Trivia Quiz Time”
”Alexa, open Trivia Quiz Time”
”Alexa, launch Trivia Quiz Time”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia quiz time
des: "Trivia Quiz Time" offers a dynamic and interactive experience to test your knowledge on a variety of topics. The game boasts a broad selection of questions from different fields like history, science, and pop culture, catering to diverse interests. Players can customize the length of each game session, making it adaptable to their schedules. The format is straightforward with multiple-choice questions, and the game tracks scores for a competitive touch. It's designed for voice interaction, providing an engaging, hands-free experience. Not only is it entertaining, but it also has educational value, enhancing players' knowledge base. With its vast question pool and customizable sessions, "Trivia Quiz Time" promises great replayability and a continually fresh challenge for trivia lovers and learners alike.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
